item.title: Understanding Hugo Shortcodes
item.description: Hugo shortcodes are powerful tools for adding custom HTML or other special content within Markdown files without complex code. They enable enhanced flexibility and are a core part of Hugo’s functionality, offering reusable snippets for embedding media, custom components, or dynamic content. Below, weâ€™ll explore what shortcodes are and highlight some popular examples. What are Hugo Shortcodes? Shortcodes in Hugo are like mini-templates that simplify embedding specialized content into a page.
